raw_body: Beloved husband of late Rajini, son of late Conrad and of Basilica, brother of late Brian, Felix and Palitha, son-in-law of late Sabapathy and of Chandra. Cortege leaves residence No. 40, Uswetakeiyawa on Monday 26th February at 3.30 p.m. for burial at Roman Catholic cemetery, Uswetakeiyawa.
